title: Allai, Sardinia
text:
Allai () is a "<a href="comune">comune</a>" (municipality) in the <a href="Province%20of%20Oristano">Province of Oristano</a> in the <a href="Italy">Italian</a> region <a href="Sardinia">Sardinia</a>, located about north of <a href="Cagliari">Cagliari</a> and about east of <a href="Oristano">Oristano</a>.
Allai borders the following municipalities: <a href="Busachi">Busachi</a>, <a href="Fordongianus">Fordongianus</a>, <a href="Ruinas">Ruinas</a>, <a href="Samugheo">Samugheo</a>, <a href="Siamanna">Siamanna</a>, <a href="Siapiccia">Siapiccia</a>, <a href="Villaurbana">Villaurbana</a>.
